title: Rare Hits of The 80's Vol. 65
description:
I said in an earlier post that for the past few months I have been re-organizing and checking my vinyl collection to see what's there that I have not ripped. I found and ripped a lot of 7'' singles and some LPs I did not even remember I had them! At the end of the day with songs I found on external hard drive, I figured I have enough songs to put out another Rare Hits of The 80s installment. 

Anyhow for those who were mourning the death of this series, this constitutes some sort of resurrection! ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s load of cool songs and lots of synth! I have also thrown in the song Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ On The RoofÃ¢â‚¬Å“,infamously known as Ã¢â‚¬Å“Stay The Second Time AroundÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½  that had haunted everyone as obscure as it could remain for 17 years. 

Enjoy and seed.
